0.text: Innate - Heart of the Half-Beast: Sett  regenerates「 an additional 0.15 / 0.5 / 1 / 2 (based on level) health per second for every  5% of his missing health. 」「 up-to 2.85 / 9.5 / 19 / 38 (based on level) health per second (maximum reached at  95% missing health). 」

1.text: Innate - Heavy Hands: Sett's basic attacks alternate between his Left Punch and a Right Punch on-attack. Sett begins attacking with his Left Punch, and will reset back to it after 2 seconds of not performing a Right Punch.
1.html: Innate - Heavy Hands: Sett's basic attacks alternate between his Left Punch and a Right Punch on-attack. Sett begins attacking with his Left Punch, and will reset back to it after 2 seconds of not performing a Right Punch.

2.text: Sett's Right Punch is empowered to gain  50 bonus range (unless  Knuckle Down is active), attack at 8 times the Left Punch's attack speed, and deal 5 − 90 (based on level) (+ 55% bonus AD) bonus physical damage.
2.html: Sett's Right Punch is empowered to gain  50 bonus range (unless Knuckle Down is active), attack at 8 times the Left Punch's attack speed, and deal 5 − 90 (based on level) (+ 55% bonus AD) bonus physical damage.
markedPassages: 50 bonus range
Knuckle Down
5 − 90 (based on level)

0.text: Active: Sett empowers his next two basic attacks within 5 seconds to gain  50 bonus range and deal bonus physical damage, capped at 400 total damage of each attack against  monsters.(bug)
0.html: Active: Sett empowers his next two basic attacks within 5 seconds to gain  50 bonus range and deal bonus physical damage, capped at 400 total damage of each attack against monsters.(bug)

0.content: 10 / 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 (+ 1% (+ 1 / 1.5 / 2 / 2.5 / 3% per 100 AD) of target's maximum health)

1.content: 20 / 40 / 60 / 80 / 100 (+ 2% (+ 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6% per 100 AD) of target's maximum health)

1.text: For 1.5 seconds, Sett also gains  30% bonus movement speed while facing  visible enemy  champions within 2000 units.
1.html: For 1.5 seconds, Sett also gains  30% bonus movement speed while facing visible enemy champions within 2000 units.
markedPassages: 30% bonus movement speed
visible
champions

2.text: Knuckle Down  resets Sett's basic attack timer. The empowered attacks are guaranteed to be a Left Punch followed by a Right Punch, resetting Sett's current  Pit Grit state (if applicable) and ignoring the usual time-out period for a follow-up Right Punch.
2.html: Knuckle Down resets Sett's basic attack timer. The empowered attacks are guaranteed to be a Left Punch followed by a Right Punch, resetting Sett's current Pit Grit state (if applicable) and ignoring the usual time-out period for a follow-up Right Punch.
markedPassages: resets
Pit Grit
possibleConcerningAbilities: Knuckle Down  resets Sett's basic attack timer. The empowered attacks are guaranteed to be a Left Punch followed by a Right Punch, resetting Sett's current  Pit Grit state (if applicable) and ignoring the usual time-out period for a follow-up Right Punch.

0.text: Passive: Sett stores 100% of post-mitigation damage taken as Grit on his resource bar, up to 50% of his maximum health. Each instance of stored Grit decays by 30% every second after 4 seconds.
0.html: Passive: Sett stores 100% of post-mitigation damage taken as Grit on his resource bar, up to 50% of his maximum health. Each instance of stored Grit decays by 30% every second after 4 seconds.

1.text: Active: Sett immediately grants himself a  shield equal to his expended Grit for 3 seconds, decaying after 0.75 seconds, and charges up a strike over the cast time.
1.html: Active: Sett immediately grants himself a shield equal to his expended Grit for 3 seconds, decaying after 0.75 seconds, and charges up a strike over the cast time.
markedPassages: shield

2.text: After the cast time, he unleashes a blast in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit; those hit in a center line are dealt   true damage instead.
2.html: After the cast time, he unleashes a blast in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit; those hit in a center line are dealt  true damage instead.

0.content: 80 / 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 (+ 25% (+ 25% per 100 bonus AD) of expended Grit)

markedPassages: true damage
true damage

0.text: Active: Sett  pulls in enemies at his front and back along the target direction, dealing physical damage and  slowing them by 70% for 0.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Sett pulls in enemies at his front and back along the target direction, dealing physical damage and slowing them by 70% for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: pulls in
slowing

1.text: If Facebreaker affects at least one enemy on each side, all enemies are  stunned for 1 second upon landing.
1.html: If Facebreaker affects at least one enemy on each side, all enemies are stunned for 1 second upon landing.
markedPassages: stunned

2.text: Sett is unable to move or attack for 0.25 seconds after Facebreaker's cast time.
2.html: Sett is unable to move or attack for 0.25 seconds after Facebreaker's cast time.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Sett is unable to move or attack for 0.25 seconds after Facebreaker's cast time.

0.text: Active: Sett  suppresses and  reveals the target enemy  champion while  dashing with  displacement immunity to their location and  attaching them to himself upon arrival. He leaps another 600 units in the same direction to slam the target into the ground, creating a massive shockwave and quickly  sliding forward 250 units beyond the impact.
0.html: Active: Sett suppresses and reveals the target enemy champion while dashing with displacement immunity to their location and attaching them to himself upon arrival. He leaps another 600 units in the same direction to slam the target into the ground, creating a massive shockwave and quickly sliding forward 250 units beyond the impact.
markedPassages: suppresses
reveals
champion
dashing
displacement immunity
attaching
sliding

1.text: Enemies within the epicenter take  physical damage, and other enemies hit by the shockwave take physical damage that is reduced by up to 75% based on proximity. All targets hit are  slowed by 99% for 1 second.
1.html: Enemies within the epicenter take physical damage, and other enemies hit by the shockwave take physical damage that is reduced by up to 75% based on proximity. All targets hit are slowed by 99% for 1 second.

0.content: 200 / 300 / 400 (+ 120% bonus AD) (+ 40 / 50 / 60% of primary target's bonus health)

1.content: 50 / 75 / 100 (+ 30% bonus AD) (+ 10 / 12.5 / 15% of primary target's bonus health)

markedPassages: slowed

2.text: The dash will end and create the impact prematurely upon encountering terrain that cannot be dashed through, whether by distance or invalid space.
2.html: The dash will end and create the impact prematurely upon encountering terrain that cannot be dashed through, whether by distance or invalid space.
possibleConcerningAbilities: The dash will end and create the impact prematurely upon encountering terrain that cannot be dashed through, whether by distance or invalid space.
